trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Behandler en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The ContainerVisual class is used as a container for a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> objects.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ContainerVisual brukes som en beholder for en samling av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> class derives from the ContainerVisual class, such that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> class can also contain a collection of visual objects.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>klassen som er avledet fra klassen ContainerVisual slik at den <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>klasse kan også inneholde en samling visuelle objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"> </xref> verdi den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The bitmap effect for this visual object.
trans-unit.target: Punktgrafikken effekten for denne visuelle objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectInput"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectInput"> </xref> verdi den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The bitmap effect input value for this visual object.
trans-unit.target: Punktgrafikken effekt inndataverdien for denne visuelle objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a cached representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en bufret representasjon av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Set the CacheMode property when you need to increase performance for content that is time-consuming to render.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen CacheMode når du trenger å øke ytelse for innhold som er tidkrevende å gjengi.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CacheMode"></xref> that holds a cached representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CacheMode"> </xref> som inneholder en bufret representasjon av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den underordnede samlingen av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection"></xref> that contains the children of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection"> </xref> som inneholder underordnede til den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the clipping region of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir beskjæringsområde på den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that defines the clipping region.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> som definerer beskjæringsområde.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding box for the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter rammen for innholdet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.DescendantBounds%2A> property to return the union of all the content bounding boxes for all of the descendants of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> object, but not the object itself.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.DescendantBounds%2A>til å returnere Unionen av alt innhold markeringsrammer for alle underordnede for et <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>-objekt, men ikke selve objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.DescendantBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> som angir rammen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the union of all the content bounding boxes for all of the descendants of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>, but not including the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter Unionen av alt innhold markeringsrammer for alle underordnede for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>, men ikke inkludert innholdet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Get the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.ContentBounds%2A> property to return the cached bounding box rectangle for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> itself.
trans-unit.target: Få de <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.ContentBounds%2A>til å returnere bufrede avgrensende for rektangelet for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>seg selv.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.ContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the combination bounding box.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> som angir kombinasjon avgrensende boksen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bitmap effect to apply to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir punktgrafikken effekten skal brukes i <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref> that represents the bitmap effect.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"> </xref> som representerer punktgrafikken effekten.

trans-unit.source: Returns a specified child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> for the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et angitt underordnede <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> for overordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> does not have any children.
trans-unit.target: Som standard en <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>ikke ha underordnede elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that represents the index value of the child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En 32-biters heltall med fortegn som representerer indeksverdien for underordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of `index` must be between 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount*> - 1.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for `index` må være mellom 0 og <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount*>- 1.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: The child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Underordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the top-most visual object of a hit test by specifying a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det øverste visual objektet for en treffprosent test ved å angi en <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit%2A> property of the return value represents the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> object that was hit.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit%2A>for returverdien representerer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>objektet som ble oppdaget.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> </xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The point value to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Punktverdi til nådde test.

trans-unit.source: The hit test result of the visual returned as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Treffprosent testresultatet av den visuelle effekten returneres som en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult"> </xref> type.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a hit test on the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref> by using the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterCallback"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Starter en treffprosent test på den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref> ved hjelp av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterCallback"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The `filterCallback` parameter can be null, in which case, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Den `filterCallback` parameteren kan være null, i så fall ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: If `filterCallback` is not `null`, it is invoked before `resultCallback`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `filterCallback` er ikke `null`, den startes før `resultCallback`.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that allows you to ignore parts of the visual tree that you are not interested in processing in your hit test results.
trans-unit.target: Representanten som gjør det mulig å ignorere deler av visual treet at du er interessert i behandling i treffprosent testresultatene.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that is used to control the return of hit test information.
trans-unit.target: Representanten som brukes til å kontrollere retur av nådde testinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Defines the set of parameters for a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Definerer settet med parametere for en treffprosent test.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref> from its reference point.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forskyvningen verdien for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref> fra sin referansepunkt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> that represents the offset value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"> </xref> som representerer den forskyvningen verdien for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>, based on 0=transparent, 1=opaque.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tettheten for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>, basert på 0 = gjennomsiktig, 1 = ugjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies a range from fully transparent to fully opaque.
trans-unit.target: En verdi mellom 0 og 1 som angir et område fra helt gjennomsiktig til helt ugjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref> is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref> is completely opaque.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 0 indikerer at det <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref> er helt gjennomsiktig mens verdien 1 indikerer at det <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref> fullstendig ugjennomsiktig.

trans-unit.source: A value 0.5 indicates 50 percent opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates 72.5 percent opaque, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 0,5 angir 50 prosent ugjennomsiktig verdien 0.725 angir 72.5 prosent ugjennomsiktig og så videre.

trans-unit.source: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.
trans-unit.target: Verdier som er mindre enn 0, behandles som 0, under verdier som er større enn 1 behandles som 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brush that specifies a possible opacity mask for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en velgeren som angir en mulig tetthet-maske for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Opacity masks can be used to create effects such as vignettes, based on the alpha channel values of the brush.
trans-unit.target: Tetthet masker kan brukes til å opprette effekter som bildebeskjæring, basert på alfa kanalverdiene i velgeren.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that represents the opacity mask value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> som representerer masken tettheten til den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter overordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Note that this is returned as <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>, rather than a raw object.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at dette returneres som <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>, i stedet for et raw-objekt.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>

trans-unit.source: This property might return `null` in a disconnected tree, or if you have traversed to the tree root at the window level.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan returnere `null` i en frakoblet treet, eller hvis du har traversert til treroten på vindusnivå.

trans-unit.source: The parent of the visual.
trans-unit.target: Overordnet den visuelle effekten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the transform that is applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir transformeringen som skal brukes på den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> is a base class that unifies many different forms of transforms.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>er en basisklasse som samkjører mange forskjellige typer transformeringer.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>

trans-unit.source: The transform value.
trans-unit.target: Transformeringsverdien for.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of children for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall underordnede for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual> does not have any children.
trans-unit.target: Som standard en <xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>ikke ha underordnede elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual>

trans-unit.source: The number of children in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Antall underordnede i den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection"> </xref> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X (horizontal) guideline for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir X (vannrett) retningslinjer for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels.
trans-unit.target: Pikselbredden festing er prosessen innhold oppsettet er løst slik at objektet kanter gjengis på enheten-spesifikke piksler.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] grafikksystem bruker uavhengig av enheten enheter slik at oppløsning og enheten uavhengighet.

trans-unit.source: Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] setting.
trans-unit.target: Hver enhet uavhengig pikselbredden skaleres automatisk med systemets [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] innstillingen.

trans-unit.source: This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware.
trans-unit.target: Dette gir [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programmer riktig skalering forskjellige [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] innstillinger og gjør programmet automatisk [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-bruker.

trans-unit.source: However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid dette [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] uavhengighet kan opprette uregelmessige edge gjengivelse på grunn av anti-aliasing.

trans-unit.source: These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels.
trans-unit.target: Disse delene, vanligvis sett som deaktivere eller "soft" kanter kan oppstå når plasseringen til en kant faller midt i en enhet pikselbredden i stedet for mellom enheten piksler.

trans-unit.source: To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: Å løse dette problemet [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] gjør det mulig for objektet kanter i et visual tre "feste" til enheten piksler via pikselbredden festing, fjerne soft kantene fra anti-aliasing.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal guideline.
trans-unit.target: Vannrett retningslinjer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Y (vertical) guideline for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Y (loddrett)-retningslinjer for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ContainerVisual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels.
trans-unit.target: Pikselbredden festing er prosessen innhold oppsettet er løst slik at objektet kanter gjengis på enheten-spesifikke piksler.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] grafikksystem bruker uavhengig av enheten enheter slik at oppløsning og enheten uavhengighet.

trans-unit.source: Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] setting.
trans-unit.target: Hver enhet uavhengig pikselbredden skaleres automatisk med systemets [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] innstillingen.

trans-unit.source: This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware.
trans-unit.target: Dette gir [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programmer riktig skalering forskjellige [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] innstillinger og gjør programmet automatisk [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-bruker.

trans-unit.source: However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid dette [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] uavhengighet kan opprette uregelmessige edge gjengivelse på grunn av anti-aliasing.

trans-unit.source: These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels.
trans-unit.target: Disse delene, vanligvis sett som deaktivere eller "soft" kanter kan oppstå når plasseringen til en kant faller midt i en enhet pikselbredden i stedet for mellom enheten piksler.

trans-unit.source: To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.
trans-unit.target: Å løse dette problemet [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] gjør det mulig for objektet kanter i et visual tre "feste" til enheten piksler via pikselbredden festing, fjerne soft kantene fra anti-aliasing.

trans-unit.source: The vertical guideline.
trans-unit.target: Loddrett retningslinjer.
